Simple Music Player is a lightweight, open-source Android app for playing your local music collection.

Features:
• Browse music by folder
• Shuffle playback
• Chromecast support for streaming to your TV
• Album art display
• Material Design 3 interface

Built with Jetpack Compose and designed for simplicity and ease of use.

Developed by Bammellab.
